resources.string: HeyNotes is your minimal, distraction-free space for thoughts, ideas, and plans. It is designed to be fast, local and private when needed. All notes you create can be located under Internal Storage > Documents > HeyNotes. This allows you to bring in your previous .md files from any other app you currently use, and export them from this app when you need it.

Secure Folders are hidden from your phone\'s File Manager and exist in a protected storage area accessible only by this app. Be careful: If you delete a Secure Folder, all notes inside it are permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
1. Find the "Private" folder in your list.\n2. Tap it to set up your 4 or 6-digit PIN.\n3. Notes created here are encrypted locally.
How to get Gemini API Key?

1. Go to Google AI Studio - API Key page.

2. Click the \"Create API key\" button.

3. You will be asked to select a project. You can choose an existing one or create a new project such as \"HeyNotes\".

4. Give a name to your key (e.g., \"HeyNotes\"). Unique names will help you easily track usage statistics later.

5. Once created, copy the key from the list and paste it into the field above.

Usage Limits:
HeyNotes is powered by the Gemini 3.0 Flash Preview model. The current free quota allows for approximately 1000 audio analyses per day. Please note that these limits are subject to change according to Google\'s policies.

Disclaimer: This application utilizes the Gemini AI API to provide transcription services but is independently developed and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Google LLC.
